dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Hey, B, guess what's buzzing in the aviation world for Kazakhstan?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Hey, B, guess what's buzzing in the aviation world for Kazakhstan?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Ooh, do tell! I'm always keen on, like, new travel news.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Ooh, do tell! I'm always keen on, like, new travel news.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So, Almaty Airport just announced that China Southern Airlines, you know, from China? They've launched this new route... Guangzhou to Almaty and back.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, Almaty Airport just announced that China Southern Airlines, you know, from China? They've launched this new route... Guangzhou to Almaty and back.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The press service of Almaty Airport announced that on June 25, Chinese airline China Southern Airlines launched a new international route on the Guangzhou " Almaty " Guangzhou route.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Guangzhou, huh? That's pretty significant. How often?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Guangzhou, huh? That's pretty significant. How often?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, three times a week, actually. Mondays, Wednesdays, and Fridays. Started, uh, June 25th.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, three times a week, actually. Mondays, Wednesdays, and Fridays. Started, uh, June twenty fifth.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: on June 25, Chinese airline China Southern Airlines launched a new international route... Flights will operate three times a week " on Mondays, Wednesdays, and Fridays.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Okay, so that's like, a good connection for business. What else?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Okay, so that's like, a good connection for business. What else?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Well, get this. There's a new airline coming in from Kyrgyzstan, Asman Airlines. They're doing Almaty to Issyk-Kul.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, get this. There's a new airline coming in from Kyrgyzstan, Asman Airlines. They're doing Almaty to Issyk-Kul.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Meanwhile, the Civil Aviation Committee reported that starting June 27, a new airline from Kyrgyzstan, Asman Airlines, is entering the Kazakh market. The carrier will begin operating direct regular passenger flights on the Almaty " Issyk-Kul route

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Issyk-Kul! That's a popular spot, especially for summer, right? [interrupts] How many times a week are they doing that?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Issyk-Kul! That's a popular spot, especially for summer, right? How many times a week are they doing that?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, totally. Twice a week, Mondays and Fridays. And, um, get this, FlyArystan is *also* doing Almaty to Issyk-Kul, starting July 3rd.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, totally. Twice a week, Mondays and Fridays. And, um, get this, FlyArystan is also doing Almaty to Issyk-Kul, starting July third.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The carrier will begin operating direct regular passenger flights on the Almaty " Issyk-Kul route twice a week, on Mondays and Fridays. In addition, starting July 3, Kazakh airline FlyArystan will also launch a direct flight on the Almaty " Issyk-Kul route

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Wait, so two airlines on that route? That's awesome for choice!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Wait, so two airlines on that route? That's awesome for choice!

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly! FlyArystan's doing Thursdays and Sundays. So, uh, during summer, that's four regular flights a week to Issyk-Kul.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly! FlyArystan's doing Thursdays and Sundays. So, uh, during summer, that's four regular flights a week to Issyk-Kul.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Kazakh airline FlyArystan will also launch a direct flight on the Almaty " Issyk-Kul route, with a frequency of two flights per week (on Thursdays and Sundays). Thus, during the summer season, there will be four regular weekly passenger flights on this route.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Wow, so loads of options to get there now. That's really good news for summer holidays.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Wow, so loads of options to get there now. That's really good news for summer holidays.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: And one more thing, the Ministry of Transport, they've hinted that Kazakhstan residents will soon be able to fly direct to Jordan.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And one more thing, the Ministry of Transport, they've hinted that Kazakhstan residents will soon be able to fly direct to Jordan.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Previously, the Ministry of Transport announced that residents of Kazakhstan would soon be able to travel directly to Jordan, as plans for a new international route are underway.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Jordan? No way! Like, Petra and all that? That's a completely new one!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Jordan? No way! Like, Petra and all that? That's a completely new one!

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, plans are underway. So, it's not just new routes, but totally new destinations opening up.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, plans are underway. So, it's not just new routes, but totally new destinations opening up.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Uh, I love it! More choices, more places to explore. Excellent.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Uh, I love it! More choices, more places to explore. Excellent.
